content.content: Governance at a Glance! March 18, 2021 The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk, and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm. Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Another day, another DAI: supply hits yet another ATH with 2.85B DAI in circulation. The protocol has passed another major milestone, hitting 100M DAI in annualized stability fee revenue.  DAI Descipher is back to full functionality, showing a weekly VWAP for DAI at $1.002   ICYMI - Announcements  Artists are given a chance to win Dai and have some featured artwork at MakerDAO  by creating a visual piece based on one of the original MakerDAO Core Principles.    Active Discussions ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ [Discussion] NFT Vaults - @Aaron_Bartsch points to Beeple’s 5000-day NFT sale for $69 Million  and asks how Maker could serve NFT vaults. 1, 2, 3, Blindspots check! Core Units we need? - @juan asks for a conversation to ensure we are not leaving behind key assets in the Core Unit transition. [Proposal] Petition Letter to A16z - @iammeeoh discusses drafting letters to VC holders of MKR to encourage governance participation.  Seeking Consensus ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ Highlighted Signals [Signal Request] Increase Uniswap DAI-ETH, USDC-ETH, & DAI-USDC Debt Ceilings + add DC-IAM - New! - @NikKunkel signals raising the Debt Ceilings and implementing the DC Instant Access Module for many of the UNI-V2 vault types. [Signal Request] Adjust the Surplus Buffer (March/April 2021) - New! - @ultraschuppi signals raising the Surplus Buffer (again), with @SebVentures giving some helpful risk analysis concerning what a “safe” SB looks like for Maker’s current portfolio. Other Active Signals  [Signal Request] Adjust ZRX-A DC-IAM-line [Signal Request] Adjust COMP-A DC-IAM-line [Signal Request] Adjust YFI-A DC-IAM-line [Signal Request] Adjust PSM-USDC DC   Ongoing Initiatives ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!  Help Wanted ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Governance at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm. Three (Or Two) Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Since the beginning of this year, DAI supply grew from 1.1B to this week’s ATH of 2.9B. Regardless of the rise in demand, DAI manages to keep its peg: the volume-weighted average price is at $1.002 for this week.   ICYMI - Announcements  All 97 initiatives in the MakerDAO ecosystem (including community calls, grants, products, teams) are now collected in one place, thanks to @amyjung. Also from the Operational Support Team comes the Call for Proposals program, serving to identify and fill any needs of MakerDAO. The Project Compass working group is now official. Their task: to establish a framework for future vision setting in the DAO.   Active Discussions ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Emerging global AML/KYC framework and DeFi (and Maker) - New @jacek raises the issue of KYC regulations as they relate to MakerDAO. Should we burn the admin keys? An argument for minting MKR - New Building on previous discussions, @juan advocates for a joint effort to discuss contributor compensation and potentially form a working group to tackle the issue of minting MKR for vesting purposes.  Seeking Consensus ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] Petition Letter to A16z - New Following a previous discussion, @iammeeoh is looking to gather consensus around a petition for a16z to get involved in governance. [Signal Request] Adjust the Surplus Buffer (March/April 2021) - Ongoing @ultraschuppi is looking for consensus on raising the Surplus Buffer and potentially burning some MKR from fees.  Ongoing Initiatives ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!  Help Wanted ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
